hadiths.text: Another version of this tradition transmitted through a different chain of narrators by Ibn ‘Abbas says:“He took my head or the hair of my head and made me stand on his right side”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلَيْنِ يَؤُمُّ أَحَدُهُمَا صَاحِبَهُ كَيْفَ يَقُومَانِ
chapter.eng-name: If Two People Are Praying, One Of Whom Is The Imam, How Should They Stand ?
